name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts
overview: Arthur is back! Two years after rescuing his dusky eyed maiden from the demon king, he must save her once more from him. Special weapons: When the player finds a special weapon(these are found in chests) this can be activated by holding down the fire button/key until the indicator on the status panel lights up fully, and then releasing the fire button/key. Continue option: When the player has lost all of his lives, he will be given the option to continue from where he last left off, this option will be available for a limited number of times(the number of 'continues' will vary from format to format)
